DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect complementary alternative therapy , specifically alternate nostril breathe foot reflexology , intraocular pressure patient ocular hypertension .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Alternate Therapies Intraocular Pressure Ocular Hypertension
DOC.detailed_description: 11 patient recruited Temple Ophthalmology 2014 2016 . Patients ocular hypertension age 48-74 . Patients exclude currently perform ANB FR , unable perform task , previous eye surgery laser , receive CAM ocular hypertension , unable complete washout period . After 30-day drug washout , patient complete either ANB FR . After instruction , assign task perform 5 minute . FR do commercially available foot reflexology board ( JAPAN TSUBO HH-700 ) focus base second third toe foot . Two week later , patient complete alternate task . IOP measure task , immediately task every 30 minute two hour . Sign rank test use evaluate IOP change within group .
